DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating Enbrel Treatment Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.criteria: Adults : Severe ankylose spondylitis ( AS ) patient respond adequately previous therapy Patients know hypersensitivity Enbrel component product Patients sepsis risk sepsis Patients active infection include chronic localized infection tuberculosis .
